settings.title: How long will it take to receive my item?
settings.question: How long will it take to receive my item?
settings.description:
For all custom products, we offer a 30-45 day lead time from the date of purchase. All custom products are made to order, and will be shipped directly from our manufacture in China via UPS.

For all in stock products, we offer a 3-7 day shipping time. Items are shipped via UPS ground

settings.title: What are my options if I want to cancel my order?
settings.question: What are my options if I want to cancel my order?
settings.description:
You can cancel your order as long as it has not been sent. You must keep in mind that your order can be sent the same day or the first working day after you place your order.

To make the cancellation, please contact our customer service through the e-mailÂ sales@championball.com

If the order has already left our stores, you can not cancel it, but you can make the return once you received it.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.description: When your order is delivered to the transport agency, you will receive an email with a tracking number. This number will allow you to track your package and check the status of your shipment.
